body:
To be clear, I'm thinking we should add a file `tensorflow/core/platform/windows/integral_types.h` that includes `tensorflow/core/platform/default/integral_types.h`, and adds `typedef ptrdiff_t ssize_t`.

And we change `tensorflow/core/platform/types.h` to include `windows/integral_types.h` instead of `default/integral_types.h` https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/platform/types.h

Let's see what @mrry  thinks of this, or if there are any issues with this suggestion.
